fns-with-duplicated-code.name: "when loading current resource"::"should create a current resource with the name of the new_resource"
"when loading current resource"::"should set the current resources package name to the new resources package name"
"when loading current resource"::"should run pkg info with the package name"
"when loading current resource"::"should set the installed version to nil on the current resource if package state is not installed"
"when loading current resource"::"should return the current resource"
